What am I doing now?

This page was inspired by Derek Sivers and nownownow.com. Last updated 29 June 2016.

I’m starting a learning process to improve in Front-end development. I have created a Kanban to organize myself and I will write the process in my blog. All the resources that I will use in the project will be available in GitHub in a collaborative site like Learn to program resources WomenWhoCode.

After finding some great illustrators like Frannerd, Debbie Tung or Liam O’Farrell, I have the “urge” to learn illustration, so I will start with a introduction course in Madrid with watercolors.
